feed.title: CTV, APO, CAT activity on signet

entry.title: CTV, APO, CAT activity on signet
entry.summary: The correspondence highlights the development of a new tool designed for exploring Bitcoin Inquisition transactions, inspired by previous investigative efforts. This tool aims to simplify and enhance the analysis of such transactions in the future. The sender is open to feedback for any potential improvements to this explorer. For more details on the explorer and its functionalities, one can visit [https://inquisition.observer](https://inquisition.observer).
